snippet: The dissident artist Ai Weiwei says the tax authorities in Beijing have agreed to review their ruling that he pay a multimillion-dollar fine for tax evasion.
abstract: Dissident Chinese artist Ai Weiwei says that the tax authorities in Beijing have agreed to review their ruling that he pay a multimillion-dollar fine for tax evasion.
lead_paragraph: The dissident artist Ai Weiwei says the tax authorities in Beijing have agreed to review their ruling that he pay a multimillion-dollar fine for tax evasion.

headline.seo: China: Dissident Says Government Will Review Fine for Tax Evasion
headline.main: China: Dissident Says Government Will Review Fine for Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: China: Dissident Says Government Will Review Fine for Tax Evasion
